plot: As we all know, men have fantasies, and so does the coach of the Aota Academy. He coaches the volleyball team and begins to have sexual fantasies. Soon, a new girl, Nanase Morimura joins. Fantasies run wild and the coach can't wait to further her education with some extra "lessons."
ending_theme: "Koi no Super Ace" by Mari Adachi, Mie Sonozaki
